drinks.name: Martini
drinks.recipe: Mix 3 parts vodka & 1 part dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A nice drink for a late night conversation.
drinks.recipe: Mix equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
drinks.serve: Serve cold, either on the rocks or straight up.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: Like regular tonic, but with gin.
drinks.recipe: Mix 2 parts gin & 1 part tonic water.
drinks.serve: Serve in a tall glass over ice, garnished with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Tequilla Sunrise
drinks.description: A refreshing Orange Juice based drink with a kick
drinks.recipe: Fresh Orange Juice and Voka with a sprig of fresh ment

snacks.name: Nachos
snacks.recipe: Cover expensive, organic tortilla chips with Cheez Whiz.
snacks.serve: Serve in a hand-thrown ceramic bowl, garnished with canned black olives

snacks.name: Hummus
snacks.description: Sure to impress your vegan friends!
snacks.serve: Place unceremoniously on the table, along with pita bread.

snacks.name: Arugula and Walnut Salad
snacks.recipe: Mix arugula, toasted walnuts, and thinly-sliced Parmesan cheese. Dress with lemon and olive oil.
snacks.serve: Place on tiny, precious little plates.

snacks.name: Potato Strips
snacks.description: Fresh Idaho Potatoes grilled/broiled to perfectionl

snacks.name: Stuffed peppers
snacks.description: Green peppers stuffed with cheese and sausage.
snacks.recipe: Green peppers, cheese, sausage, salt and pepper
snacks.serve: Fresh and hot from the oven

snacks.name: Bananas Foster
snacks.description: Bananas Foster is a dessert made from bananas and vanilla ice cream, with a sauce made from butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, dark rum, and banana liqueur.
snacks.recipe: butter, dark brown sugar, rum, vanilla extract, 3 bananas, peeled, chopped walnuts, vanilla icecream
snacks.serve: Serve while bananas are hot and icecream is ice cold

snacks.name: Potato Chips
snacks.serve: With salt in a bowl and onion dip

snacks.name: Chimichangas
snacks.recipe: Fried tortillias, spicey meat, cheese, tomato sauce and chiles
snacks.serve: Grade cheese on top and serve hot
